content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron ore mine at position(-15.5, -50.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position not specified)

### Stone furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (status: NO_INGREDIENTS, produced 5 iron plates)

### Stone furnace at position(2.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (status: NO_INGREDIENTS, produced 0 iron plates)

### Stone furnace at position(4.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (status: NO_INGREDIENTS, produced 0 iron plates)

### Stone furnace at position(6.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (status: NO_INGREDIENTS, produced 5 iron plates)

### Wooden chest at position(8.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (status: NORMAL, inventory is empty)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into furnaces. Check your inventory to confirm the presence of iron ore or coal.

### Errors due to full inventory
- Monitor your inventory capacity to avoid attempting to insert items into furnaces that are already full. Consider extracting items or using them before adding more.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities that may block placement.
